Union_City.New Jersey Youth Theatre:
New Jersey Youth Theatre (NJYT) is a 501(c)3 charitable organization with a business office in Westfield, NJ and Performing Arts School in Roselle Park, NJ.
Founded in 1991, New Jersey Youth Theatre has produced more than 36 main-stage productions. The summer programs alone have served more than 160,000 patrons from NJ, NY, PA, CT, and over 2,200 young performers from the State of New Jersey.
In addition to producing professional youth theatre, the company also has a School for the Performing Arts.
